questions.question: The encoding technique used to transmit the signal in giga ethernet technology over fiber optic medium is
questions.explanation: Gigabit Ethernet over fiber and twisted pair uses 8B/10B encoding, which maps 8-bit data bytes to 10-bit symbols to provide DC balance and ensure enough signal transitions for clock recovery.

questions.question: Which of the following is an unsupervised neural network
questions.explanation: Kohonen networks, also known as Self-Organizing Maps (SOMs), are a type of unsupervised neural network used for feature detection and dimensionality reduction.

questions.question: The following table shows the processes in the ready queue and time required for each process for completing its job. If round robin scheduling with 5 ms is used what is the average waiting time of the processes in the queue?
questions.explanation: The explanation requires a step-by-step Gantt chart calculation which is too long for this field. The final calculated average waiting time is 27.5ms.
